meanings.definition: Having an extreme fear of germs.
meanings.sent1: She is germophobic and always carries hand sanitizer.
meanings.sent2: The germophobic student refused to touch the doorknob.
meanings.sent3: The germophobic cat avoided the muddy pawprints on the floor.
meanings.sent4: His germophobic tendencies spread to his friends, who started carrying disinfectant wipes.
meanings.sent5: The germophobic character in the movie wore a hazmat suit everywhere.

meanings.definition: A person who is excessively afraid of germs.
meanings.sent1: The germophobic always wore gloves in public places.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a germophobic and won't share food with anyone.
meanings.sent3: The germophobic at the party used a tissue to open every door.
meanings.sent4: She joked that her germophobic friend would faint at the sight of a dirty dish.
meanings.sent5: The germophobic's house was filled with bottles of disinfectant spray.
